channel.title: TOR:CVE on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TOR:CVE on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: MEG Board Rejects Richer Bid From Billionaire Waterous’s Strathcona
item.description: MEG Energy Corp.’s board turned down Strathcona Resources Ltd.’s sweetened offer to buy the oil sands producer, recommending that shareholders stick with a rival proposal from Cenovus Energy Inc.

item.title: MEG Board Rejects Richer Bid From Billionaire Waterous’s Strathcona
item.description: MEG Energy Corp.’s board turned down Strathcona Resources Ltd.’s sweetened offer to buy the oil sands producer, recommending that shareholders stick with a rival proposal from Cenovus Energy Inc.

item.title: Cenovus CEO Says He’s ‘Closing the Door’ on Higher Bid for MEG
item.description: Cenovus Energy Inc.’s top executive said the company doesn’t plan to increase its takeover offer for oil sands producer MEG Energy Corp., despite a higher rival offer from Strathcona Resources Ltd.

item.title: Cenovus CEO Says He’s ‘Closing the Door’ on Higher Bid for MEG
item.description: Cenovus Energy Inc.’s top executive said the company doesn’t plan to increase its takeover offer for oil sands producer MEG Energy Corp., despite a higher rival offer from Strathcona Resources Ltd.

item.title: Cenovus CEO Says He’s ‘Closing the Door’ on Higher MEG Offer
item.description: Cenovus Energy Inc.’s top executive said the company doesn’t plan to increase its takeover offer for oil sands producer MEG Energy Corp., despite a higher rival bid from Strathcona Resources Ltd.

item.title: Cenovus CEO Says He’s ‘Closing the Door’ on Higher MEG Offer
item.description: Cenovus Energy Inc.’s top executive said the company doesn’t plan to increase its takeover offer for oil sands producer MEG Energy Corp., despite a higher rival bid from Strathcona Resources Ltd.

item.title: Strathcona Raises MEG Bid to Block Deal Made With Cenovus
item.description: Strathcona Resources Ltd. increased its bid for oil sands producer MEG Energy Corp., seeking to break up the oil sands producer’s sale to larger Canadian rival Cenovus Energy Inc.

item.title: Strathcona Raises MEG Bid to Block Deal Made With Cenovus
item.description: Strathcona Resources Ltd. increased its bid for oil sands producer MEG Energy Corp., seeking to break up the oil sands producer’s sale to larger Canadian rival Cenovus Energy Inc.

item.title: Cenovus to Buy MEG Energy in $5 Billion Oil-Sands Deal
